Source.Name: proton
Source.Summary: Compatibility tool for Steam Play based on Wine and additional components
Source.Description: Proton is a tool for use with the Steam client which allows games which are exclusive to Windows to run on Linux and macOS operating systems. It uses Wine to facilitate this.
